Header: Yoga Training Given to Jaffna Troops
Content: 16 Vijayabahu Infantry Regiment of the Security Force Headquarters - Jaffna (SFHQ-J) taking an initiative organized a Yoga training session for the troops serving in areas under the SFHQ-J during June 8-9. The programme was conducted on the instructions of Major General Darshana Hettiarachchi, Commander, Security Forces - Jaffna in order to strike a balance between the body and the mind. A large gathering of Officers and Other Ranks attended the training session.
